_blueprint.description: Explains the JSON artifact that defines the agent's built-in static toolset.

tools.name: read_artifact
tools.description: Reads and returns the full content of a specific artifact from the Virtual File System (VFS). Can optionally specify a version.

path.description: The full VFS path of the artifact (e.g., '/modules/utils.js').

version.description: Optional: A specific version identifier to read (e.g., 'c123'). If omitted, reads the latest version.

tools.name: list_artifacts
tools.description: Lists all available artifacts in the VFS, optionally filtered by a directory path.

path.description: Optional: The directory path to filter by (e.g., '/modules/').

tools.name: diff_artifacts
tools.description: Compares two versions of an artifact and returns the differences.

path.description: The path of the artifact to compare.

version_a.description: The first version identifier (e.g., 'c10'). Use 'latest' for the current version.

tools.name: get_artifact_history
tools.description: Retrieves the modification history for a specific artifact.

path.description: The VFS path of the artifact.

tools.name: search_vfs
tools.description: Searches the content of all artifacts in the VFS for a specific string or regular expression.

query.description: The string or regex pattern to search for.

is_regex.description: Set to true if the query is a regular expression. Defaults to false.

tools.name: write_artifact
tools.description: Creates or updates an artifact in the Virtual File System. This enables self-modification and evolution.

path.description: The VFS path where the artifact should be written (e.g., '/modules/ui-style.css').

content.description: The content to write to the artifact.

metadata.description: Optional metadata about this write operation.

reason.description: Why this artifact is being created or modified.
